## baboonctl rpc maintenance

Set the server in maintenance mode

### Synopsis

Set the server in maintenance mode.

```
baboonctl rpc maintenance [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for maintenance
  -m, --mode   set maintenance mode
```
